md:
giải nghĩa từ "retain" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Retain (verb) - giữ lại, duy trì
	* Meaning: to keep or continue to have something
	* Example: The company will retain its current CEO.
	* Related words: keep, maintain, preserve, hold
2. Retain (verb) - giữ lại, lưu trữ
	* Meaning: to keep or store something in one's memory or mind
	* Example: She tried to retain the information from the lecture.
	* Related words: remember, recall, memorize, store
3. Retain (verb) - giữ lại, duy trì
	* Meaning: to continue to employ or engage someone or something
	* Example: The company will retain the services of a consultant.
	* Related words: keep, hire, employ, engage

Note: The meaning of "retain" can vary depending on the context in which it is used.

    • Related words: remember, recall, memorize, store
  3. Retain (verb) - giữ lại, duy trì

Note: The meaning of "retain" can vary depending on the context in which it is used.
